{{{ # XWiki Enterprise Manager translation page xem.xem=XWiki Enterprise Manager
# MESSAGES xem.install.success=XWiki Enterprise Manager installation success. xem.install.error=XWiki Enterprise Manager installation failed ({0}). xem.install.noneed=No action needed.
# ANSWERS xem.answer.install.title=XWiki Enterprise Manager installation xem.answer.install.actions=To complete installation XWiki Enterprise Manager will :\n xem.answer.install.actions.template=* Add default template
# Homepage manager.dashboard.welcome=What is a workspace? manager.dashboard.workspaces=Workspaces manager.homepage.title=Main wiki manager.homepage.installCheck.notYetComplete=The installation process is not yet complete.\n\ \n\ In order to finish the installation process, please log in as Admin and go to the page [[{0}>>{0}]]. }}}
